Package org.liquidengine.legui.system.renderer.nvg.util

Class NvgColorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liquidengine.legui.system.renderer.nvg.util.NvgColorUtil
  • public final class NvgColorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    NanoVG utility. Used to convert some NanoVG elements to other. For example NVGColor to Vector4f and back.

        g - green.
        b - blue.
